title: Cocky Roommate
description: Weston Reid is not what Kendra Lawson had in mind when she decided to get a roommate.He’s aloof, rude, standoffish—a total jerk. And it doesn’t help that he walks around in his underwear like he owns the place.Kendra drives Weston crazy. She’s too nice, too cute, too messy in her pajama pants and socks. The roommate situation is temporary, but it can’t be over soon enough.Until Weston’s life crashes and burns—literally—and he realizes Kendra is the only person he can count on.Weston doesn’t do relationships. He keeps people at a distance, and he has his reasons. But living with Kendra starts to crack him wide open, revealing the real man inside. And sleeping with Kendra one room away might just be the thing that kills him.Author’s note: A sweet, sunshine heroine breaks through the tough, guarded exterior of her a$$hole roommate. A swoon-worthy first kiss, a secretly protective hero, and a grand gesture that will leave you breathless. The bigger they are, the harder they fall, and Weston Reid falls HARD.
author: Claire Kingsley
